public ref class TextureBrush sealed : System::Drawing::Brush

summary.span: 類別的每一個屬性都是 物件，這個物件會使用影像來填滿形狀的內部。

span.span: Each property of the class is a object that uses an image to fill the interior of a shape.

summary.span: 這個類別無法被繼承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何取得新的點陣圖使用方法。The following code example demonstrates how to obtain a new bitmap using the method. 它也會示範。It also demonstrates a . 這個範例被為了搭配 Windows Form。This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms. 建立表單，其中包含名為 Button2 的按鈕。Create a form containing a button named Button2. 程式碼貼到表單和關聯的按鈕 Button2_Click 方法`Click`事件。Paste the code into the form and associate the Button2_Click method with the button's `Click` event. remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要 `e`，這是參數的`Paint`事件處理常式。The following example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the `Paint` event handler. 程式碼會建立物件和該紋理筆刷的完全相同複本，然後使用複製來填滿螢幕上的矩形。The code creates a object and an exact copy of that texture brush, and then uses the copy to fill a rectangle on the screen. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicTextureBrushExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicTextureBrushExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicTextureBrushExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicTextureBrushExamples/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicTextureBrushExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicTextureBrushExamples/VB/form1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取得與這個 物件關聯的 物件。

span.span: Gets the object associated with this object.

summary.span: 依照指定的順序，根據指定的 物件來乘以代表這個 物件之局部幾何轉換的 物件。

span.span: Multiplies the object that represents the local geometric transformation of this object by the specified object in the specified order.

MemberSignature.Value: public void MultiplyTransform (System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix matrix);
.method public hidebysig instance void MultiplyTransform(class System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix matrix) cil managed
public: void MultiplyTransform(System::Drawing::Drawing2D::Matrix ^ matrix);
member this.MultiplyTransform : System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix -> unit

param.name: matrix
param.span: 幾何轉換所要乘以的 物件。

span.span: The object by which to multiply the geometric transformation.

summary.span: 藉由將指定的 物件附加在前面，根據指定的 物件來乘以代表這個 物件之局部幾何轉換的 物件。

span.span: Multiplies the object that represents the local geometric transformation of this object by the specified object by prepending the specified object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 變換矩陣物件會指定定義紋理的映像的轉換方式。The transformation matrix of a object specifies how the image that defines the texture is transformed. 比方說，如果轉換矩陣，可指定的順時針旋轉 90 度旋轉，紋理影像旋轉順時針旋轉 90 度。For example, if the transformation matrix specifies a rotation of 90 degrees clockwise, the texture image is rotated by 90 degrees clockwise. ## Examples 下列範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要 `e`，這是參數的`Paint`事件處理常式。The following example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the `Paint` event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 建立 物件。Creates a object. - 建立一個新矩陣，在 x 方向指定 50 個單位的翻譯。Creates a new matrix that specifies a translation of 50 units in the x-direction. - 乘以矩陣的材質筆刷的轉換矩陣。Multiplies the matrix with the transformation matrix of the texture brush. - 填滿的矩形，使用紋理筆刷。Fills a rectangle, using the texture brush. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicTextureBrushExamples#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicTextureBrushExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicTextureBrushExamples#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicTextureBrushExamples/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicTextureBrushExamples#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicTextureBrushExamples/VB/form1.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public void MultiplyTransform (System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix matrix, System.Drawing.Drawing2D.MatrixOrder order);
.method public hidebysig instance void MultiplyTransform(class System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix matrix, valuetype System.Drawing.Drawing2D.MatrixOrder order) cil managed
public: void MultiplyTransform(System::Drawing::Drawing2D::Matrix ^ matrix, System::Drawing::Drawing2D::MatrixOrder order);
member this.MultiplyTransform : System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix * System.Drawing.Drawing2D.MatrixOrder -> unit

param.name: matrix
param.span: 幾何轉換所要乘以的 物件。

span.span: The object by which to multiply the geometric transformation.

param.name: order
param.span: 列舉，指定要乘以兩個矩陣的順序。

span.span: A enumeration that specifies the order in which to multiply the two matrices.

summary.span: 依照指定的順序，根據指定的 物件來乘以代表這個 物件之局部幾何轉換的 物件。

span.span: Multiplies the object that represents the local geometric transformation of this object by the specified object in the specified order.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 變換矩陣物件會指定定義紋理的映像的轉換方式。The transformation matrix of a object specifies how the image that defines the texture is transformed. 比方說，如果轉換矩陣，可指定的順時針旋轉 90 度旋轉，紋理影像旋轉順時針旋轉 90 度。For example, if the transformation matrix specifies a rotation of 90 degrees clockwise, the texture image is rotated by 90 degrees clockwise. ## Examples 下列範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要 `e`，這是參數的`Paint`事件處理常式。The following example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the `Paint` event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 建立 物件。Creates a object. - 建立一個新矩陣，在 x 方向指定 50 個單位的翻譯。Creates a new matrix that specifies a translation of 50 units in the x-direction. - 乘以矩陣的材質筆刷的轉換矩陣。Multiplies the matrix with the transformation matrix of the texture brush. - 填滿的矩形，使用紋理筆刷。Fills a rectangle, using the texture brush. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicTextureBrushExamples#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicTextureBrushExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicTextureBrushExamples#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicTextureBrushExamples/CS/form1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicTextureBrushExamples#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicTextureBrushExamples/VB/form1.vb#3)]

summary.span: 將此 物件的 屬性重設為單位矩陣。

span.span: Resets the property of this object to identity.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要 `e`，這是參數的`Paint`事件處理常式。The following example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the `Paint` event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 建立 物件。Creates a object. - 您可以將紋理影像旋轉 90 度。Rotates the texture image by 90 degrees. - 填滿的矩形。Fills a rectangle. - 轉換矩陣重設識別。Resets the transformation matrix to identity. - 填滿第二個矩形。Fills a second rectangle. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicTextureBrushExamples#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicTextureBrushExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicTextureBrushExamples#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicTextureBrushExamples/CS/form1.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicTextureBrushExamples#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicTextureBrushExamples/VB/form1.vb#4)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要 `e`，這是參數的`Paint`事件處理常式。The following example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the `Paint` event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 建立 物件。Creates a object. - 影像的縮放比例紋理 x 方向的兩次。Scales the texture image by two times in the x-direction. - 填滿的矩形在畫面上，使用紋理筆刷。Fills a rectangle on the screen, using the texture brush. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicTextureBrushExamples#7](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicTextureBrushExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#7)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicTextureBrushExamples#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicTextureBrushExamples/CS/form1.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicTextureBrushExamples#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicTextureBrushExamples/VB/form1.vb#7)]

summary.span: 取得或設定 物件的複本，這個複本會為與這個 物件相關聯的影像定義局部幾何轉換。

span.span: Gets or sets a copy of the object that defines a local geometric transformation for the image associated with this object.

value.span: 物件的複本，定義只套用至藉由使用這個 物件所繪製填色的幾何轉換。

span.span: A copy of the object that defines a geometric transformation that applies only to fills drawn by using this object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 幾何轉換可以用於將轉譯、 縮放、 旋轉，或扭曲定義這個筆刷的紋理的影像。A geometric transformation can be used to translate, scale, rotate, or skew the image that defines the texture of this brush. 因為矩陣傳回和屬性為筆刷的幾何轉換的複本，當您不再需要時，應該處置的矩陣。Because the matrix returned and by the property is a copy of the brush's geometric transform, you should dispose of the matrix when you no longer need it.

summary.span: 依照指定的順序，根據指定的維度來轉換此 物件的局部幾何轉換。

span.span: Translates the local geometric transformation of this object by the specified dimensions in the specified order.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何取得新的點陣圖使用方法。The following code example demonstrates how to obtain a new bitmap using the method. 它也會示範屬性和列舉型別。It also demonstrates the property and the enumeration. 這個範例被為了搭配 Windows Form。This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms. 建立表單，其中包含名為 Button2 的按鈕。Create a form containing a button named Button2. 程式碼貼到表單和關聯的按鈕 Button2_Click 方法`Click`事件。Paste the code into the form and associate the Button2_Click method with the button's `Click` event. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ImageExample#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ImageExample/CPP/form1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ImageExample#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ImageExample/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ImageExample#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ImageExample/VB/form1.vb#2)]
